name: Zinn_Kudri
content:
Zinn Kudri was a Dathomirian female aide of Karkarodon politician Tas Gallin in the Galactic Senate. In her youth, Kudri worked as a technician and scavenger, becoming swooped into a life of crime. During one bad encounter, she was rescued by Gallin, who made Kudri her aide and turned her life around. Kudri would take covert operations in which she would extract secrets and uncover illegal activity, which would be used to aid the Galactic Republic. She was present for Kaj Loomit's sabotage of a simulation chamber in the Tipoca City Military Complex on the planet Kamino. Kudri was marked with Dathomiri clan tattoos. She owned a blaster pistol, comlink, electronic lock breaker, hand scanner, slicer gear, utility belt, stimpacks, vibroknife, and stun grenades. She also had prosthetic left arm, which she disguised.
Zinn Kudri appears in Fantasy Flight Games' roleplaying adventure Begun, The Clone Wars Have!, released exclusively for attendees of GenCon in 2019.
